title: Random FPS Drops.
body:
So im playing on a RX 470 Nitro+ 8GB version.
and im having random FPS drops, it happened also with my old video card wich was an HD 7770. 
thing is im palying normally at 250 fps, then somewhere during the match my fps drop to 1 for a second then go back to 250, and idk why, at first i though it was my old graphics card, but now im using another one and the problem persists.
I reinstalled the game, and of course the drivers.
Any solutions please??

replies.body: I KEEP HAVING FPS DROPS FROM 300 TO 20 IN RANDOM TIMES, SOME HELP THANKS

I know you've done some troubleshooting and reinstalled your drivers, but you may have outdated ones as well which can cause FPS issues.  There may be other factors as well like bad game files, or a recent Windows 10 update that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that may actually help resolve FPS problems.

Otherwise, give our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide a go to help tune up your PC and get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions.
So after 4 days, still not a damn reply to solve my problem ^^?

They're the most updated AMD ones.
Temperature aint an issue, 30C on video card and CPU.
This only happens on league, GTA V/FALLOUT 4/WITCHER they all run smoothly at 60+ with no studders

i did also a mallwarebytes scan.
My Services are all disabled.
and Defrag says my computer is 0% fragmented
